HPI 8138 Altia Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1992 N1 Endurance Series Winner S. Katsura/T. Hara

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer Page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8138/8138.html

1992 was the second year for the N1 Endurance Series (which would eventually become the current Super Taikyu series). Shinichi Katsura and Takahiko Hara won 4 of the 6 rounds, easily taking overall victory in the series in the Altia-sponsored R32 seen here. The model is what you would expect from HPI.

Japanese Championship Archive: 1992
